text: More evidence-based research showing the advantages of #cannabis for #cancer patients. #Terpenes known to help: humulene, terpinolene, myrcene, beta-caryophyllene, limonene, pinene, linalool, bisabolol, eucalyptol, borneol, terpineol, camphene, delta 3 carene—to name a few. https://t.co/iZk4zt8uHZ
